subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Paul Martin and Chris Kunitz scored power-play goals and Pascal Dupuis added his sixth goal of the playoffs as the host Pittsburgh Penguins beat the Ottawa Senators, 4-1.
snippet: Paul Martin and Chris Kunitz scored power-play goals and Pascal Dupuis added his sixth goal of the playoffs as the host Pittsburgh Penguins beat the Ottawa Senators, 4-1.
